title: Looking for a Jungler
body:
Our team QuickFire are looking for a jungler ranked Gold-Silver.

Must have Teamspeak, must be able to play Weekdays in the afternoons from 4pm-10pm And on weekends (there will be days where we won't be playing, so don't stress about not being online 24/7)

We have all roles covered, we need someone to progress with us as a team.

Add me "Shiney" {{champion:429}}

Edit (We're still looking !, Add me ingame or Leave a message here)

replies.body: im down add me ingame mattsherona
